title: Ep#17 - The Pills (Guest Starring Scout Compton)
itunes:title: Ep#17 - The Pills (Guest Starring Scout Compton)
itunes:subtitle: Bleeders DIEgest kicks off the month of October with special guest actor Scout Compton (Rob Zombie's Halloween). Sam is convinced she is a monster, her therapist begs to differ. The power of suggestion will decide. PLUS on a Bleeders DIEgest post-...
description:
Bleeders DIEgest kicks off the month of October with special guest actor Scout Compton (Rob Zombie's Halloween). Sam is convinced she is a monster, her therapist begs to differ. The power of suggestion will decide. PLUS on a Bleeders DIEgest post-show, we talk about the making of the episode, a sneak peek of what's to come and read your reviews! **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more. Click the link to join https://www.patreon.com/bleedersdiegest To haunt us on social media click here https://linktr.ee/bleedersdiegest



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
